EB Games, Watch Out When Buying!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2005 Topics (Year of the Mocchi Scream): EB Games, Watch Out When Buying!
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, January 20, 2005 - 06:29 pm:

They've got some new policy about adding a warranty to games when selling them, thus adding fees to your total at the register. Here's a LINK to some commentary about how it works.

By King Bunny on Friday, January 21, 2005 - 05:00 pm:

I had a somewhat similar experience. But instead of it being "automatic," the employee was badgering me almost to get the warranty (he also did it to most of the "younger" gamers that were in the line before me).
I refused.
